label: financial_irregularity_02_ep_014
content:

### Auditor Notes

### Events
- Year-end orders: 38 POs received in final week
- Shipping overtime authorized through Dec 31
- Annual audit planning meeting with external auditors

### Notes
- February close: Q4 audit fieldwork in progress. Distributor rebate accruals finalized.
